Entries.SeedShop_Entry: Oh, it's really pouring out there

Entries.Caroline: #$c .7#I hope the sun comes out soon. What did the weather report say today?#A good cup of tea is excellent on a day like this. Here. I've got an extra.[614]

Entries.9{{YearRemainder}}: Gosh, @, I was up way too late last night trying to balance the books.#$b#Apologies if I don't feel like chatting.
Entries.11{{YearRemainder}}: Think I might order some new tea...Let's see, what have I not had recently?
Entries.13{{YearRemainder}}: Wonder if any of our supplies is carrying a new tea?
Entries.15{{YearRemainder}}: Wish I had more time to garden, but running a small business is a lot of work.
Entries.19{{YearRemainder}}: Did you see the {{i18n:clothing.brand.{{Random:01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 08}} }} dress Haley was wearing?#$b#I would never when I was her age!
Entries.25{{YearRemainder}}: %Caroline is muttering to herself.#$b#I wonder if we should get Abigail some therapy or something...#$e#What? Oh, it's nothing.

Entries.17{{YearRemainder}}: Ever since Pierre decided that the shop should be open seven days a week, I've felt like I've always been at work.$s#$b#Wish I could just get a little time to drink a nice cup of tea.
Entries.21{{YearRemainder}}: Used to enjoy going out to the forest to gather mushrooms. We would sometimes sell them, helped when we needed the money.
Entries.23{{YearRemainder}}: Lewis handles most of the good export out of this county, and we're now handling most of the imports.$h

Entries.1_2: @, I feel so old and out of touch these days. I have no clue what the young people want anymore.
